foodItems.title: Vegan Pad Thai
foodItems.description: A classic Thai dish made with rice noodles, vegetables, and tofu in a sweet and tangy sauce.

foodItems.title: Mediterranean Salad
foodItems.description: A refreshing salad made with tomatoes, cucumbers, feta cheese, and olives in a lemon vinaigrette.

foodItems.title: Vegetable Curry
foodItems.description: A spicy and flavorful Indian curry made with mixed vegetables and coconut milk.

foodItems.title: Grilled Chicken Skewers
foodItems.description: Tender chicken marinated in herbs and spices and grilled to perfection on skewers.
